Articles.Content:
So, in this challenge you must make a sub! Why you ask? I don't know.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

RULES

Sub must be able to ascend and descend

Sub must be able to move forward

It must be made in the SPH

----------------------------------------------

Thank you for entering! The sub I like most will, Look cool, go fast, and has a "special" touch to it
The huge text is really unneccesary and you should at least read the challenge submission guide: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guide

Take a look at this one: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113743-Deep-Diver-Challenge%21

And maybe have a quick peek at http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guide
